wikipedia_page.main: Colonel Poulett George Henry Somerset CB (19 June 1822 – 7 September 1875) was a British soldier and Conservative Party politician.

response: | rowspan="3" | Col Poulett Somerset || rowspan="3" | Conservative

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1868 United Kingdom general election

response: * Poulett Somerset CB (1822–1875), British soldier and politician

The first Master of the Hunt was the Scotsman Charles Elphinstone Fleeming. Other Masters of the Hunt included Colonel Poulett Somerset, C.B. 7th Regiment of Foot (Royal Fusiliers), Colonel J. Kelly Holdsworth, and Colonel Morgan Crofton.

The Monmouthshire by-election of 1871 was held on 4 March 1871.  The byelection was held due to the resignation of the incumbent Conservative MP, Poulett Somerset.  It was won by the unopposed Conservative candidate Lord Henry Somerset.
